mapper.select: SELECT p.*, d.departmentName FROM Professor p LEFT JOIN department d ON p.department_no = d.department_no
mapper.insert: INSERT Professor (id, name, professor_phone, professor_email, password1, password2 ,password_question, password_answer, department_no, userType) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{professor_phone}, #{professor_email}, #{password1}, #{password2}, #{password_question}, #{password_answer}, #{department_no}, '교수')
mapper.update: UPDATE Professor SET id = #{id}, name = #{name}, professor_phone = #{professor_phone}, professor_email = #{professor_email}, department_no = #{department_no}, password1 = #{password1}, password_question = #{password_question}, password_answer = #{password_answer}, WHERE professor_no = #{professor_no}
